title: TS534 Vehicular Troposcatter Communication Station
explain: The TS534 is a medium/large capacity, medium/long distance, and BLOS vehicular troposcatter communication station, which is applied in backbone communication link establishment of strategic communication backbone network and army regional communication network, and BLOS communication between EW troops / ground-air missile troops and superior command post.
features:
Functions

  • Medium/large capacity, medium/long distance, and BLOS transmission
  • Service: voice, data, fax, video
  • Encryption
  • EOW
  • faults can be located to main module
  • Optical fiber tail-connection, convenient for user access
  • Relay

Features

  • Good anti-jamming and anti-interception capability: high-frequency and narrow beam
    transmitted parallel to the ground
  • Excellent anti-fading capability Employing octuple diversity Rx technique
  • Long single hop range
  • Flexible configuration of various transmission rates
  • Quick deployment: with assisted antenna alignment, deployed with 3 operators in 30 minutes.
form:
Specifications
Communication distance110 km（smooth sphere，Ns=310，8448 kbps，Pe≤1×10－6）
90 km（smooth sphere， Ns=310，34368 kbps, Pe≤1×10－6）
Operation frequency4400 ~ 4580 MHz 4820~ 5000 MHz
Tx Power2×400 W（SSPA）
Tx Rate2048 kbps~34368kbps
AntennaTwo 2.4 m grid parabolic antennas
